vehicles.description: On the right side of the image is a forklift facing the main vehicle. It appears to be stationary and is located at or very close to the edge of the driving path.
vehicles.explanation: Forklifts may enter this lane; there is a potential hazard, so be prepared to stop or avoid collision.

vulnerable_road_users.description: In the distance at the center of the image, two cyclists can be seen riding side by side on the right side of the road, in the opposite direction of the travel of the autonomous vehicles.
vulnerable_road_users.explanation: The cyclist signals that motorists should maintain a safe distance and be ready to slow down or stop if necessary, overtake with caution, and ensure enough space is provided to guarantee safety.

barriers.description: On the left side, there is a barrier formed by long buildings or construction site fences, separating the road from the construction area.
barriers.explanation: Obstacles mark the boundaries of the road and indicate that the driving path may be restricted or there might be construction activities nearby.

general_perception.description and explanation: In the traffic image, there is a forklift on the right side, facing the main vehicle and seemingly stationary, possibly very close to the driving path's edge, posing a potential hazard as forklifts may enter the lane, requiring preparedness to stop or avoid a collision. Also observable are two cyclists in the distance, located at the center of the image, riding side by side on the right road side, going in the opposite direction to the autonomous vehicles, prompting the need for motorists to maintain a safe distance, be ready to slow down or stop if necessary, overtake with caution, and ensure sufficient space for safety. On the left, a barrier is present formed by buildings or construction site fences, separating the road from an adjacent construction area, marking the road's boundaries and suggesting possible driving path restrictions or nearby construction activities. Traffic signs, traffic lights, traffic cones, and other objects are not mentioned in the data, indicating their absence in the image.

driving_suggestion: Due to the possibility of forklifts entering the road from the right side, please drive cautiously. Proceed slowly and be prepared to give way (if necessary). Be mindful of bicycles and motorcycles ahead; once it is safe to do so, please provide ample space to overtake them. Be alert for potential construction activities or vehicle ingress and egress, as warnings for obstacles have been provided. Drive carefully due to uncertain road conditions and be ready to adjust your speed at any time depending on visibility or changes in conditions.

1.description and explanation: The object is a construction vehicle, specifically a forklift, recognizable by its pair of metal forks used to lift and move materials. It appears to be stationary or moving very slowly. Based on the vehicle's presence and considering it is a common sight in areas undergoing construction or where heavy materials are being handled, the ego car should reduce speed and proceed with caution, maintaining a safe distance. The driver should be prepared for potential unexpected movements by the construction vehicle or the presence of construction workers and materials around it.
